turkish_example_sentence: Sen bu tehlikeli durumu bilmemiş olsaydın, o yola girmezdin.
english_example_sentence: If you had not known about this dangerous situation, you would not have gone on that road.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты не знал об этой опасной ситуации, ты бы не пошел по той дороге.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen bu tehlikeli durumu ______, o yola girmezdin.
